summary: A common man fights against the corruption and injustice happening around him.
cast: Sandeep Kulkarni|Purnima Ahire|Audumber Aphale|Ashwini Apte|Shashank Bawkar|Aditi Bhagwat|Srushti Bhoske|Vinit Bonde|Aakash Dabhade|Chandrakant Gokhale|Sandesh Jadhav|Gautam Joglekar|Jitendra Joshi|Bhau Kadam|Nishikant Kamat|Pradip Karnik|Harshada Khanvilkar|Ganesh Mayekar|Madhavi Pai|Prasad Pandit|Shaikh Sami|Vinayak Shanbaug|Prasad Shinde|Shekhar Shukla|Shilpa Tulaskar|Dushyant Wagh
title: Dombivli Fast
